item.description:
Thanks for all the great ideas.  We will definitely schedule Ravenswood again soon (love that park) and Maudslay and Marblehead (can't wait for Spring at Maudslay!!).  Since Plum Island season is winding down, and I want to get there with my dog before it closes to dogs, let's go there for our walk tomorrow.  I may or may not be able to grab coffee or lunch after...but if anyone wants to coordinate that, they can do so.  My ability to go will depend upon how soon I am able to get through my pile of work tonight ;)

I have never been to Plum Island, so the best meeting location I can find is at Plum Island center beach, turn right on Southern Boulevard.  Follow the road to the end where you'll see a parking lot on the left and a sign for $10 parking. (no charge off season)  The road curves around the parking lot and goes past the Blue Hotel (so I read, at least) but you can pull into the parking lot on this side.  If anyone has a better meeting location, please feel free to make a suggestion!  I will be bringing my dog, and believe they are allowed off leash at the beach. 

I'll collect a dollar towards meetup fees from every one.  THanks!

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Sunday afternoon walk....PLUM ISLAND is the place :)
